alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:59AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Meigs, northeastern Gallia, southern Athens and northwestern Mason Counties through 1115 AM EST... At 1058 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rutland, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Rio Grande, Albany, Racine, Rutland, New Haven, Mason, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Henderson, Vinton, Cheshire, Adamsville, Lakin and Stroud Run State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
